Detailed Description

An Appearance component encapsulating per-pixel comositing attributes.

void render ( RenderState &  state  )  const [virtual]

Render this object, for inner use.

Note: CompositingMode should be rendered only at second rendering pass(pass=2). In other cases, do nothing.

Reimplemented from Object3D.

const int ALPHA = 64 [static]

Selects the alpha blend mode.

const int ALPHA_ADD = 65 [static]

Selects the additive blend mode.

const int MODULATE = 66 [static]

Selects the basic modulating blending mode.

const int MODULATE_X2 = 67 [static]

Selects the brighter modulating blending mode.
